Question 1.question: What is the heuristic which the sequence diagram follows?
Question 1.answer_a: The message arrow in sequence diagram go from left to right and is read from bottom to top
Question 1.answer_b: The sequence diagram must follow the order of events in the use case description
Question 1.answer_c: Position the lifelines to make message arrows as short as possible

Question 2.question: The order of events in a sequence diagram is determined:
Question 2.answer_a: By following the order of events in the use case description
Question 2.answer_b: By placing numbers in comments along the left-hand margin of the diagram
Question 2.answer_c: By the relative position of the events on the timeline
Question 2.answer_d: By the sequence numbers of the events
